CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03A02

TITLE.P: 1130701 HVO Media Studies, New Construction for Media Studies at Volda University College K201 Turnkey contract with solution proposals.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Statsbygg would like, in connection with project:
Name: HVO Media Studies — new construction for Media Studies at Volda University College.
Contract K201 Turnkey contract with solution proposal.

The Contracting Authority uses Mercell Sourcing Service. To express your interest and gain access to any documents, please click on the link below or copy and paste the link into your browser. [[https://permalink.mercell.com/81899496.aspx]]. Then follow the instructions on the web page.

Volda University College (HVO) has commissioned Statsbygg [the Norwegian Directorate of Public Construction and Property] to start work with the engineering design of a new construction for Media Studies. The assignment also comprises localization of the new construction on campus. In principle this is clarified.
The building shall be a new free-standing education building for the University College’s Media Studies.
The Media education is very important for HVO and the country. The education must be said to be the University College’s profile education.
An important part of the assignment is also to adapt the new building with the Campus’ varied architectural style. Site placement is clarified.
The construction programme (requirement specification) has been developed and the project shall be adapted to HVO’s economic resiliency.
The Norwegian Directorate of Public Construction and Property requests that turnkey contractors with consulting groups, see point 3.2, seek qualification for turnkey contracts with solution proposal.

The engineering design of the solution proposal shall be developed to maturity equivalent to the draft project, so that the Directorate of Public Construction and Property can determine the cost limit and get user agreement on functional solutions and operations/techniques. Based on the award criteria for the competition, the Directorate of Public Construction and Property will select a winner who will be awarded the assignment. See the annex to this invitation, document IIAH2 – point 4.2.

A contract is entered into for the entire project, ie optimization/preliminary project and detailed project/implementation. The project is a so called marketable project that involves the continuation from optimization/preliminary project to the detailed project/implementation depends on the University College and Government’s prioritization.

SUITABILITY.P: The tenderer is required to have a legally established company.
Company Registration Certificate, foreign companies are required to have an equivalent certificate in the country where the company is registered, alternatively StartBANK ID.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Tenderers are required to have satisfactory financial implementation ability.
The extent of the size will also be emphasised.
Complete Annual Financial Statements for the last 2 years including the auditors report, alternatively StartBANK ID.
The Norwegian Directorate of Public Construction and Property reserves the right to obtain a credit rating of all tenderers.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Good experience is required from assignments of a similar size and complexity, of comparable value.
I.a. the following is emphasised for TE:
— teaching buildings in the university college and university sector and / or sixth form colleges.
All of the reference project(s) for TE shall be carried out as turnkey contracts, preferably also with contractual responsibility for the development phases.
For Architect, Consulting Electrical Engineering, Consulting Acoustics Engineering [ARK, RIE, RIAKU]:
— engineering design, preferably from all phases, of the teaching buildings in the university college and university sector.
For Consulting Electrical Engineering and Consulting Acoustics Engineering and also:
— engineering design, preferably from all phases, in at least one modern radio and TV building.
For Landscape Architect [LARK]:
— engineering design, preferably from all phases, of large office and/or teaching buildings of equivalent ambience context to HVO Campus.
The reference projects shall not be older than five years.
The following functions shall be documented (reference projects on company level):
1. Turnkey contractor (TE)
2. Architect (ARK)
3. Landscape architect (LARK)
4: Consultant electro engineer (RIE)
5. Consultant acoustics engineer (RIAKU)
A description of up to three reference projects per function shall be delivered. The Directorate of Public Construction and Property wants information about:
a. The project name.
b. Contracting Authority.
c. Type of building.
d. The size of the project in m2 and total cost (if known).
e. The company’s function (assignment/role) in the project.
f. Contract form of the projects. For TE, it must be stated if employees or sub contractors have the project.
How fare along the project is at the time of the start up of the turnkey contract shall also be stated, if it was a clean implementation contract.
g. The assignment´s contract value excluding VAT
h. The start and completion dates (year) of the projects. If the project is not completed, the current phase of the project must be stated.
i. The projects’ use of BIM.
j. The projects’ environmental ambitions.

If the company/companies that shall fill the roles of ARK / LARK / RIE / RIAKU are companies other than the executing turnkey contractor, statements must be submitted from these companies regarding their having the resources to implement the assignment.
The qualifications in point C SHALL be stated in the attached table — see IAH1v1.
